body_html: Well, I should caveat that my experiences has been on windows 10. Perhaps it's better on linux/mac. I'm having a hard time get a simple matrix_inverse to peg one of my cores to --cpu-shares=0 or even recognize more than one core. The GPU issues are tricky though, they don't come by default. Have you got it working with docker yet?
